participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and introspective, Emma enjoys deep conversations and has a passion for literature.
participant_1.background: My boyfriend is in the army. My hair is short. I play piano. My favorite color is yellow. My father is dead.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, Jake loves outdoor activities and is always on the lookout for new experiences.
participant_2.background: I work graveyard in a hotel. My favorite actor is Robert De Niro. I love the snow. I'm saving for college. I like to surf every chance I get.

content.text: What do you do for fun?
I like to surf, go skiing, and play video games.
That's cool. I like to play piano and read books.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read a variety of books, but I especially like mysteries and thrillers.
I love mysteries too! I'm currently reading The Girl in the Spider's Web.
I've heard good things about that book. I'm currently reading The Stranger by Albert Camus.
That's a classic! I read it in high school. I really liked it.
Me too! It's a very thought-provoking book.
What other books do you like?
I also like to read books by Agatha Christie, John Grisham, and Stephen King.
I love Agatha Christie! I've read most of her books.
I'm still working my way through her books. I've only read a few so far.
You should definitely read more of her books! They're all great.
I will! I'm always looking for new books to read.
I'm glad! I'm always happy to recommend books.
